#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<string>
#include<cmath>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<map>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
main()
{
	int arr[1000][1000],n,m,t,temp,temp1,sum,ans;
	int x1,y1,x2,y2;
	for(int i=0;i<1000;i++)
		arr[i][0]=arr[0][i]=0;
	cin>>n>>m;
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		sum=0;
		for(int j=1;j<=m;j++)
		{
			cin>>arr[i][j];
			sum+=arr[i][j];
			arr[i][j]=arr[i-1][j]+sum;
		}
	}
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;
		ans=arr[x2][y2]-arr[x2][y1-1]-arr[x1-1][y2]+arr[x1-1][y1-1];
		cout<<ans<<"\n";
		
	} 
}
